name: 2D shooter (yangzh37)
description:
This is my 2D shooter 

modification

This is my part of the 2D shooter, and I will upload the complete version later. This game is divided into three levels, your plane has three chances, once the enemy plane is shot down, will lose one chance, until the enemy plane is shot down. Moving the mouse is to adjust the position of the fighter plane, clicking the mouse to fire bullets, holding the mouse can continuously fire, WASD these four keys can control the position of their fighter plane.

Created by Zhengtao Yang
